title: Bobby Marks on Anthony Davis and Griffin/Drummond
description:
ESPN's Front-Office Insider Bobby Marks joins The Woj Pod to discuss the impact of the Anthony Davis injury for the Lakers and LeBron James, the marketplace for Blake Griffin and Andre Drummond, the approaching trade deadline and buyout market, and All-Star Weekend.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
